name: Mob Versus Mutant
description:
This is a game jam project that was completed as part of our Level 4 semester at Staffordshire University.  Below is the full list of credits as well as the github repository.

The actual build was completed in January 26th, 2022

Branches

Each branch belongs to a specific author of his project's assets. They each have provided their own roles on the project as follows

main - Framework Setup, Programming and Testing

sith - Level Design and Creation

the purist - Textures and Lighting

mr robot - Models and Animations

kevin hades - Animation Programming and UI

Credits

Matt Knight - sith branch

Alex McKie - the purist branch

Vamsi Krishna - mr robot branch

Colin Wood - main branch

Kevin Goldsmith - kevin hades branch

Kaleidio/Mob-Versus-Mutant: Unreal engine game jam beatem up title for Mutation Two Button rule (github.com)
